DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to ascertain the number of children with moyamoya in the UK, their presenting features, clinical course and outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Characteristics and Outcomes of Childhood Moyamoya in the UK
DOC.detailed_description: The study ahs 3 components: 1. Patient identification via the British Paediatric Surveillance Unit, and the 21 collaborating centres 2. Record review/patient interview to determine clinical features & outcomes 3. Centralised review of imaging data to ascertain radiological phenotypes
DOC.criteria: Radiological diagnosis of moyamoya Refuse consent
